Title: Closure
Writer: Taku Kishimoto (composition), Taku Kishimoto (screenplay), Kei Sambe (manga), Alexander Von David (english script)
Actors: Ryan Bartley, Christine Marie Cabanos, David W. Collins, Sara Cravens
Plot: Satoru and Sachiko try to secure Kayo's safety by exposing her mother's abuse to the consultants. However, she passes her breaking point and goes berserk.
